title: News: My Bloody Valentine Release New Album MBV
body:
Having hinted at it earlier this week, shoegaze legends **My Bloody Valentine** have finally released their hugely anticipated third album.

Simply titled **_MBV_**, the record consists of nine tracks, and is available in three formats; download, CD and vinyl, exclusively from the [band’s website](http://www.mybloodyvalentine.org/). Their first record since 1991’s _**Loveless,**_it’s been over twenty years in the making, and will undoubtedly be one of the most discussed releases of the year. Check out the tracklisting below, and head to [http://www.mybloodyvalentine.org/](http://www.mybloodyvalentine.org/) to hear/download MBV now.

1\. she found now

2\. only tomorrow

3\. who sees you

4\. is this and yes

5\. if i am

6\. new you

7\. in another way

8\. nothing is

9\. wonder 2

The download is available in the following formats and is $16:

– 16bit 44.1 K WAV file (cd quality)

– 320kbps MP3

– 24 96k WAV file
